title: What
body: My client crashed during champ select on ranked and now i have a 30 min timer and a defeat is that normal.

replies.body: The 30 minute timer would be a result of a second [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging), which is an escalation after the first.  Crashing during champion select can happen for a few reasons like a connection issue or problem with third party program.  If you have any apps like play.tv or lolrecorder running, remove them as they've been known to cause crashes.  You should also go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case your network is losing connection during champion select.  That should get you squared away!
